item.title: Nicole add a quote by Mike Royko
item.description: "Show me somebody who is always smiling, always cheerful, always optimistic, and I will show you somebody who hasn't the faintest idea what the heck is really going on." -- Mike Royko

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Francesca Lia Block
item.description: "He kissed her. A kiss about apple pie a la mode with the vanilla creaminess melting in the pie heat. A kiss about chocolate, when you haven't eaten chocolate in a year. A kiss about palm trees speeding by, trailing pink clouds when you drive down the Strip sizzling with champagne. A kiss about spotlights fanning the sky and the swollen sea spilling like tears all over your legs." -- Francesca Lia Block

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Francesca Lia Block
item.description: "A kiss about apple pie a la mode with the vanilla creaminess melting in the pie heat. A kiss about chocolate, when you haven't eaten chocolate in a year. A kiss about palm trees speeding by, trailing pink clouds when you drive down the Strip sizzling with champagne. A kiss about spotlights fanning the sky and the swollen sea spilling like tears all over your legs." -- Francesca Lia Block

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Francesca Lia Block
item.description: "Do you know when they say soulmates? Everybody uses it in personal ads. “Soul mate wanted.” It doesn’t mean too much now. But soulmates – think about it. When your soul – whatever that is anyway – something so alive when you make music or love and so mysteriously hidden most of the rest of the time, so colorful and big but without color or shape – when your soul finds another soul it can recognize even before the rest of you knows about it. The rest of you just feels sweaty and jumpy at first. And your souls get married without even meaning to – even if you can’t be together for some reason in real life, your souls just go ahead and make the wedding plans. A soul’s wedding must be too beautiful to even look at. It must be blinding. It must be like all the weddings in the world – gondolas with canopies of doves, champagne glasses shattering, wings of veils, drums beating, flutes and trumpets, showers of roses. And after that happens you know – that’s it. This is it." -- Francesca Lia Block

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Franklin Foer
item.description: "Soccer isn't the same as Bach or Buddhism. But it is often more deeply felt than religion, and just as much a part of the community's fabric, a repository of traditions." -- Franklin Foer

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "His lips tasted cool and sharp, peppermint, winter, but his hands, soft on the back of my neck, promised long days and summer and forever." -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Simon Kuper
item.description: "It seems that soccer tournaments create those relationships: people gathered together in pubs and living rooms, a whole country suddenly caring about the same event. A World Cup is the sort of common project that otherwise barely exists in modern societies." -- Simon Kuper

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Francesca Lia Block
item.description: "Our eyelashes brushed like they would weave together by themselves, turning us into one wild thing. I say, “I think I missed you before I met you even." -- Francesca Lia Block

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Miranda July
item.description: "I laughed and said, Life is easy. What I meant was, Life is easy with you here, and when you leave, it will be hard again." -- Miranda July

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Lorrie Moore
item.description: "Begin to wonder what you do write about. Or if you have anything to say. Or even if there is such a thing as a thing to say. Limit these thoughts to no more than ten minutes a day; like sit-ups, they can make you thin" -- Lorrie Moore

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Nicole add a quote by C. JoyBell C.
item.description: "You can talk with someone for years, everyday, and still, it won't mean as much as what you can have when you sit in front of someone, not saying a word, yet you feel that person with your heart, you feel like you have known the person for forever.... connections are made with the heart, not the tongue." -- C. JoyBell C.

item.title: Nicole add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "How do you spell 'love'?" - Piglet "You don't spell it...you feel it." - Pooh" -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Margaret Wise Brown
item.description: "Goodnight stars, goodnight air, goodnight noises everywhere." -- Margaret Wise Brown

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Nicole add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "So, this is my life. And I want you to know that I am both happy and sad and I'm still trying to figure out how that could be." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "Things change. And friends leave. Life doesn't stop for anybody." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Joseph Conrad
item.description: "Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men." -- Joseph Conrad

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "We laugh and laugh, and nothing can ever be sad, no one can be lost, or dead, or far away: right now we are here, and nothing can mar our perfection, or steal the joy of this perfect moment." -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Francesca Lia Block
item.description: "You are in my blood. I cant help it. We can't be anywhere except together" -- Francesca Lia Block

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Rolf Jacobsen
item.description: "For the Earth itself is a blossom, she says, on the star tree, pale with luminous ocean leaves." -- Rolf Jacobsen

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "No matter what he does, every person on earth plays a central role in the history of the world. And normally he doesn't know it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Eric Roth
item.description: "For what it’s worth: it’s never too late or, in my case, too early to be whoever you want to be. There’s no time limit, stop whenever you want. You can change or stay the same, there are no rules to this thing. We can make the best or the worst of it. I hope you make the best of it. And I hope you see things that startle you. I hope you feel things you never felt before. I hope you meet people with a different point of view. I hope you live a life you’re proud of. If you find that you’re not, I hope you have the courage to start all over again." -- Eric Roth

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Eric Roth
item.description: "I hope you live a life you’re proud of. If you find that you’re not, I hope you have the strength to start all over again." -- Eric Roth

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Angela Carter
item.description: "Cities have sexes: London is a man, Paris a woman, and New York a well-adjusted transsexual." -- Angela Carter

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Simone de Beauvoir
item.description: "There is something in the New York air that makes sleep useless." -- Simone de Beauvoir

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Tom Wolfe
item.description: "One belongs to New York instantly, one belongs to it as much in five minutes as in five years." -- Tom Wolfe
